mil5.5.10:1.2: ‘tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti.
mil5.5.10:1.3: Puna ca ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti.
mil5.5.10:2.1: Yathā nāma, bhante nāgasena, issāso vā issāsantevāsī vā bahuke divase saṅgāmatthāya upāsanaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mahāyuddhe osakkeyya;
mil5.5.10:2.2_0: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
mil5.5.10:2.2_1: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ
mil5.5.10:3.1: Yathā vā pana, bhante nāgasena, mallo vā mallantevāsī vā bahuke divase nibbuddhaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mallayuddhe osakkeyya;
mil5.5.10:3.2_0: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
mil5.5.10:3.2_1: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ
mil5.5.10:4.1_0: Kiṁ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena bhayā osakkitaṁ, udāhu apākaṭatāya osakkitaṁ,
mil5.5.10:4.1_1: udāhu dubbalatāya osakkitaṁ, udāhu asabbaññutāya osakkitaṁ, kiṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ, iṅgha
mil5.5.10:4.2_0: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
mil5.5.10:4.2_1: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya, tena
mil5.5.10:4.2_2: hi ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.5.10:4.3_0: Yadi sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami no dhammadesanāya, tena hi ‘tathāgatena
mil5.5.10:4.3_1: catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ
mil5.5.10:4.3_2: mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.10:4.4: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gambhīro dunnibbeṭho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.10:5.1_0: “Paripācitañca, mahārāja, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
mil5.5.10:5.1_1: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya, pattasabbaññutassa
mil5.5.10:5.1_2: ca appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya.
mil5.5.10:5.2_1: ālayārāmataṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷhasuggahitatañca disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ nu kho’ti
mil5.5.10:5.2_2: appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
mil5.5.10:6.1: Yathā, mahārāja, bhisakko sallakatto anekabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ naraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ cintayati ‘kena nu kho upakkamena katamena vā bhesajjena imassa byādhi vūpasameyyā’ti;
mil5.5.10:6.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa sabbakilesabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ janaṁ dhammassa
mil5.5.10:6.2_2: nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
mil5.5.10:7.1_1: jane disvā evaṁ cittamuppajjeyya ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ nu kho ime saṅgaṇhissāmī’ti;
mil5.5.10:7.2_1: sattānañca ālayārāmataṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷhasuggahitatañca disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ
mil5.5.10:7.2_2: nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
mil5.5.10:8.1: Api ca, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ dhammatā esā, yaṁ brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
mil5.5.10:8.3_0: Ye tena samayena manussā tāpasaparibbājakā samaṇabrāhmaṇā, sabbete brahmadevatā honti
mil5.5.10:8.3_1: brahmagarukā brahmaparāyaṇā, tasmā tassa balavato yasavato ñātassa paññātassa uttarassa
mil5.5.10:8.3_2: accuggatassa onamanena sadevako loko onamissati okappessati adhimuccissatīti iminā
mil5.5.10:8.3_3: ca, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
mil5.5.10:9.1: Yathā, mahārāja, koci rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā yassa onamati apacitiṁ karoti, balavatarassa tassa onamanena avasesā janatā onamati apacitiṁ karoti;
mil5.5.10:9.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, brahme onamite tathāgatānaṁ sadevako loko onamissati, pūjitapūjako,
mil5.5.10:9.2_1: mahārāja, loko, tasmā so brahmā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ āyācati dhammadesanāya, tena
mil5.5.10:9.2_2: ca kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desentī”ti.
mil5.5.10:9.3: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, sunibbeṭhito pañho, atibhadrakaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
